attributes.action: Government should debate plan R(esign) as a means of resolving the economy
attributes.additional_details:
The governents record on the economy since coming into office has, been proved by the independent office of budget responsility, as not working. The economy is facing the possibility of a recession similar or worse than that in 2008/9. The chancellor's single policy of debt reduction whilst reducing the size of the state will never allow the country to clear the debts and the extension to plan a , given in the recent statement shows the paucity of the governments thinking.

Therefore, the house should debate the competency of the chancellor and then goverment with a view to adopting plan R , I.e the removal of the chancellor from office
